hanzi-su-wiki:
猿

Значения

Обезьяна

Мнемоника

Собака 犭, одетая в кринолин (справа), похожа на обезьяну. Кринолин есть длинная одежда 衣 до почвы 土 с высоким поясом 囗.

Варианты

猨, 蝯, 𧳭, 𤝌
purpleculture_pinyin:
yuán
ape
обезьяна
rtega_mnemonic:
猿猿RSape, gibbon
  • animal looking like a dog 犭 with clothes 袁
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 袁 indicates the sound; 犭 (animal) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
猿人 [ yuán rén ]: apeman
类人猿 [ lèi rén yuán ]: hominid
北京猿人 [ běi jīng yuán rén ]: Peking ape-man; Homo erectus pekinensis (c. 600,000 BC), discovered in Zhoukoudian 周口店 in 1921
长臂猿 [ cháng bì yuán ]: gibbon; Hylobatidae (gibbon and lesser ape family)
猿猴 [ yuán hóu ]: apes and monkeys
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 犭 [ quǎn ] dog
    • 袁 [ yuán ] robe; surname
heisig_chinese_memo: The ape likes to play hide and seek with the PACK of WILD DOGS by hiding in the LIDDED CROCK. But he is easy to see because the SCARF he always wears is at the base of the LIDDED CROCK.
heisig_constituent: monkey, pack of wild dogs, earthenware jar, lidded crock, soil, dirt, ground, mouth, scarf
heisig_story: This clever little monkey has captured an entire pack of wild dogs, locked them inside a lidded crock, and wrapped the whole thing up in a silk scarf to present to the dogcatcher.
myStory: стая собак загнала обезьяну в глиняный горшок и завязала шарфом
koohiiStory1: The MONKEY likes to play hide and seek with the PACK of WILD DOGS by hiding in the LIDDED CROCK. But he is easy to see because the SCARF he always wears is at the base of the LIDDED CROCK.
koohiiStory2: To catch a monkey, chase him with wild dogs into a lidded crock, then tie it with a scarf.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: An animal that kicks dirt into people's mouths is a monkey. Monkeys are naughty little things. You should be happy it was just dirt it kicked into your mouth, and not something worse.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine looking at a monkey at the zoo. Aww, it's so cute. But then it turns around and kicks some dirt right into your aww-ing mouth. Yuck! Why monkey, why?!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You spit the dirt out of your mouth and look back at the monkey to see that it's saluting (さる) you. Is... is it mocking you?
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture the monkey saluting you as you spit dirt out of your mouth. Taste the bitter dirt and the bitter shame. You were played by a monkey.
Ru_Radicals: 口 (рот), 土 (земля), 犯 (преступник), 衣 (одежда)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the dog (犭) with the long kimono (袁) is actually a monkey
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The ape likes to play hide and seek with the PACK of WILD DOGS by hiding in the LIDDED CROCK. But he is easy to see because the SCARF he always wears is at the base of the LIDDED CROCK.
humanum_full_description_en:
"Jade Chapter. "Dog Department": "Qian, like a macaque and big, can also scream. Ape, the same as the 猨." Dog Department: "Ape, Yu. Like a monkey, long arms, good at climbing branches." "Shan Hai Jing. "Nanshan Jing": "(The mountain of the hall) many white apes." Guo Pu's note: "Today apes are as big as macaques. They have long arms and legs and are convenient; colors are black and yellow; when they sound, their voice is sad." : "The sky is scorching and the ape whistles and mourns, and the white bird flies back to the clear sand."

See also "猨", "蝯", "猱", " monkey ".
humanum_short_description_en: " Apes " are primates. They are larger than monkeys. Some of them are similar in shape to humans. They have long arms and legs, and are agile and good at climbing.
humanum_full_description:
《玉篇．犬部》：「猨，似獼猴而大，能嘯也。猿，同猨。」《字彙．犬部》：「猿，禺。似猴，長臂，善攀援樹枝。」《山海經．南山經》：「(堂庭之山)多白猿。」郭璞注：「今猿似獼猴而大。臂腳長，便捷；色有黑有黃；鳴，其聲哀。」杜甫《登高》：「風急天高猿嘯哀，渚清沙白鳥飛迴。」

　　參見「猨」、「蝯」、「猱」、「猴」。
humanum_short_description: 「猿」是靈長類動物，身形比猴子大，有的形狀與人類很相似，臂腳長，敏捷而善攀援。

猿(さる): monkey
《玉篇．犬部》：「猨，似獼猴而大，能嘯也。猿，同猨。」《字彙．犬部》：「猿，禺。似猴，長臂，善攀援樹枝。」《山海經．南山經》：「(堂庭之山)多白猿。」郭璞注：「今猿似獼猴而大。臂腳長，便捷；色有黑有黃；鳴，其聲哀。」杜甫《登高》：「風急天高猿嘯哀，渚清沙白鳥飛迴。」 參見「 猨 」、「 蝯 」、「 猱 」、「 猴 」。
"Jade Chapter. "Dog Department": "Qian, like a macaque and big, can also scream. Ape, the same as the 猨." Dog Department: "Ape, Yu. Like a monkey, long arms, good at climbing branches." "Shan Hai Jing. "Nanshan Jing": "(The mountain of the hall) many white apes." Guo Pu's note: "Today apes are as big as macaques. They have long arms and legs and are convenient; colors are black and yellow; when they sound, their voice is sad." : "The sky is scorching and the ape whistles and mourns, and the white bird flies back to the clear sand." See also " 猨", " 蝯", " 猱", " monkey".

猿字的基本解释

猿
yuán
哺乳动物，与猴相似，比猴大，颊下没有囊，没有尾巴，猩猩、大猩猩、长臂猿等都是：猿猴。猿人。

猿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yuán］
［《廣韻》雨元切，平元，云。］
亦作“猨1”。
灵长类动物。哺乳纲。似猴而大，没有颊囊和尾巴。生活在森林中。种类很多，有猩猩、长臂猿等。

猿字的英文翻译

◎ 猿
ape, jackanapes, monkey

猿字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　猿； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页716第19
【廣韻】雨元切【集韻】【韻會】于元切，?音袁。【玉篇】俗猨字。【戰國策】猿獼猴錯木據水，則不若魚鼈。

猿字的源字形

猿字的起名意思

暂无。

ape
Basic explanation of words
ape
yuán
Mammals, similar to monkeys, are larger than monkeys, have no pouches under their cheeks, and no tails. Orangutans, gorillas, and gibbons are all apes. Ape man.
ape
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yuán］
["Guangyun" Yuyuan cut, Pingyuan, cloud. ]
Also known as "猨1".
Primates. Mammalia. It is as big as a monkey, without a cheek pouch and tail. Live in the forest. There are many species, such as orangutans and gibbons.
ape
English translation of words
◎ Ape
ape, jackanapes, monkey
ape
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Si Ji 2] [Dog Character Department] "Ape; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 716 Page 19
[Guang Yun] Yu Yuanqie [Ji Yun] [Yunhui] Yu Yuanqie,? Yin Yuan. 【Jade articles】vulgar words. [Warring States Policy] Apes and macaques are not like fish and turtles.
ape
Source glyph
ape
Name meaning
Nothing.
形声字。从了(大犬),表示猿是哺乳动物;袁(yudn )声,袁本指衣长大,而猿在猴类中形体较大。猿是灵长类的动物。
灵长类哺乳动物,跟猴相似,比猴大,种类很多,没有颊囊
和尾巴。
~臂 ~猴 ~人 褐~ 黑~ 巨~ 人~ 长臂~
类人~ 心~意马 虎啸~啼 意马心~
猿
yuán
猿
猿
地
檔
Пиктофонетические символы.
Конг Ле (большая собака) означает, что обезьяна - это млекопитающее; звук Юань (юдн), Юань Бен означает, что одежда растет, а обезьяны больше у обезьян.
Обезьяны - приматы.
Приматы млекопитающие похожи на обезьян, они больше, чем обезьяны, и существует много видов без защечных мешков и хвостов.
~ рука ~ обезьяна ~ человеческий коричневый ~ черный ~ гигант ~ человек ~ длинная рука ~
Гуманоид ~ Разум ~ Чувство неряшливости ~ Плачущее сердце ~
обезьяна
обезьяна
обезьяна
Земля
файлы
yuán
I сущ.
бесхвостая, человекоподобная обезьяна; гиббон
听猿 слушать крики обезьян
猿啼 крик обезьян
II усл.
Обезьяна (9-е животное из цикла 12, соответствует циклическому знаку申, обозначающему год Обезьяны)
他属猿 он родился в год Обезьяны
Radicals: 犭, 土, 口  (animal, dirt, mouth, kick)
Meaning Mnemonic
An animal that kicks dirt into people's mouths is a monkey. Monkeys are naughty little things. You should be happy it was just dirt it kicked into your mouth, and not something worse.
Imagine looking at a monkey at the zoo. Aww, it's so cute. But then it turns around and kicks some dirt right into your aww-ing mouth. Yuck! Why monkey, why?!
Reading Mnemonic
You spit the dirt out of your mouth and look back at the monkey to see that it's saluting (さる) you. Is... is it mocking you?
Picture the monkey saluting you as you spit dirt out of your mouth. Taste the bitter dirt and the bitter shame. You were played by a monkey.
